title: Shock Le Pen verdict rocks French far right
snippets: The far-right figurehead has been barred from running for public office for five years, throwing her plans into disarray.
summary: A far-right political figure has been banned from seeking public office for the next five years, disrupting her future political ambitions.
titles: Shock Le Pen verdict rocks French far right

title: BBC Verify: What satellite images reveal about Myanmar's quake
snippets: Myanmar's military government says at least 2,000 people were killed in last week's 7.7 magnitude quake.
summary: Myanmar's military government reported that a 7.7 magnitude earthquake last week resulted in at least 2,000 fatalities.
titles: BBC Verify: What satellite images reveal about Myanmar's quake

title: US says law applies to 'all parties' in Gaza
snippets: The deaths of 15 people including paramedics in a convoy have been blamed on Israel's military.
summary: A convoy, including paramedics, was hit, resulting in the deaths of 15 people. The incident has been attributed to the Israeli military.
titles: US says law applies to 'all parties' in Gaza

title: US deports more alleged gang members to El Salvador
snippets: Officials said 17 alleged criminals were deported despite a court order.
summary: Seventeen individuals, who were labeled as alleged criminals, were deported despite there being a court order in place that should have prevented their removal.
titles: US deports more alleged gang members to El Salvador

title: Roof ripped off home as severe storms and tornadoes hit central US
snippets: Several states have been hit with heavy rain, hail and damaging winds, with storms expected to continue in some areas through Thursday.
summary: Several states are experiencing severe weather conditions, including heavy rain, hail, and damaging winds. The storms are forecasted to persist in some regions until Thursday.
titles: Roof ripped off home as severe storms and tornadoes hit central US

title: Breaking down the 2025 McDonald's All American girls' game
snippets: Everything you need to know about the 2025 McDonald's All American girls' game on Tuesday (6:30 p.m. ET, ESPN2).
summary: The 2025 McDonald's All American girls' game is scheduled for Tuesday at 6:30 p.m. ET and will be broadcast on ESPN2.
titles: Breaking down the 2025 McDonald's All American girls' game

title: Sources: Red Sox LHP Crochet gets $170M deal
snippets: Left-hander Garrett Crochet and the Red Sox are in agreement on a six-year, $170 million contract extension, sources told ESPN, keeping the 25-year-old ace with the organization that traded for him this winter to lead its rotation.
summary: The Boston Red Sox and left-handed pitcher Garrett Crochet have agreed on a six-year contract extension worth $170 million, according to ESPN sources. The 25-year-old ace, who was traded to the Red Sox this winter, is now set to lead the team's pitching rotation.
titles: Sources: Red Sox LHP Crochet gets $170M deal

title: Sources: Miles to forgo WNBA draft, enter portal
snippets: After her team's exit in the Sweet 16 on Saturday, Notre Dame guard Olivia Miles has decided to forgo the WNBA draft, despite being projected as the No. 2 overall selection, and enter the transfer portal, sources told ESPN's Shams Charania on Monday.
summary: Notre Dame guard Olivia Miles, projected as the No. 2 pick in the WNBA draft, will enter the transfer portal instead of joining the WNBA, following her team's Sweet 16 exit, according to ESPN's Shams Charania.
titles: Sources: Miles to forgo WNBA draft, enter portal

title: Braves' Profar gets 80-game ban for PED violation
snippets: Atlanta Braves outfielder Jurickson Profar was suspended for 80 games by Major League Baseball on Monday after a positive test for the performance-enhancing drug chorionic gonadotropin.
summary: Atlanta Braves outfielder Jurickson Profar has been suspended for 80 games by Major League Baseball due to a positive test for the performance-enhancing drug chorionic gonadotropin.
titles: Braves' Profar gets 80-game ban for PED violation

title: Texas wins to set up SEC Final Four clash vs. S.C.
snippets: No. 1 seed Texas wore down No. 2 TCU 58-47 in the Elite Eight on Monday night and now heads to the women's Final Four for the first time since 2003.
summary: The No. 1 seed Texas women's basketball team defeated No. 2 seed TCU with a score of 58-47 in the Elite Eight on Monday night, securing their spot in the women's Final Four for the first time since 2003.
titles: Texas wins to set up SEC Final Four clash vs. S.C.

title: Trump has promised tariff ‘liberation day’. Americans aren’t so sure
snippets: Even the president’s supporters are sceptical of new levies to be imposed on trading partners on April 2
summary: The president plans to impose new levies on trading partners starting April 2, a move that has drawn skepticism even among the president's supporters.
titles: Trump has promised tariff ‘liberation day’. Americans aren’t so sure

title: Is UBS’s ‘deal of the century’ starting to sour?
snippets: The bank’s integration of Credit Suisse is going well. It’s everything else that’s the problem
summary: The bank reports that the integration of Credit Suisse is progressing smoothly. However, it is facing challenges in other areas of its operations.
titles: Is UBS’s ‘deal of the century’ starting to sour?

title: Lessons from Russia, Turkey and India for Trump’s America
snippets: Fighting for democracy can be a lonely and dangerous business
summary: Advocating for democracy often involves risks and can lead to isolation, as individuals or groups challenging the status quo face potential dangers in their pursuit of democratic principles.
titles: Lessons from Russia, Turkey and India for Trump’s America

title: America cannot afford to break global investor trust
snippets: Even the most powerful nation in the world needs foreign investment
summary: The United States, considered the most powerful nation globally, requires foreign investment to support its economy.
titles: America cannot afford to break global investor trust

title: OpenAI secures $300bn valuation after $40bn SoftBank-led funding round
snippets: Newest financing comes as ChatGPT maker seeks to become conventional for-profit company
summary: The company behind ChatGPT has secured new financing as it transitions into a traditional for-profit business model.
titles: OpenAI secures $300bn valuation after $40bn SoftBank-led funding round

title: Clinical trial unearths hidden hypertension with automated searches of health records
snippets: A trial of 648 patients found that the new automated method and intervention strategy resulted in nearly four times as many diagnoses and treatment plans for high blood pressure compared with traditional office-based health care visits.
summary: A study involving 648 patients revealed that an automated method and intervention strategy for diagnosing and treating high blood pressure was nearly four times more effective than traditional office visits.
titles: Clinical trial unearths hidden hypertension with automated searches of health records

title: Discovery of Quina technology challenges view of ancient human development in East Asia
snippets: Researchers have uncovered a complete Quina technological system in the Longtan site in southwest China. The discovery challenges the widely held perception that the Middle Paleolithic period was mostly static in East Asia.
summary: Researchers have discovered a complete Quina technological system at the Longtan site in southwest China, challenging the previously held belief that the Middle Paleolithic period in East Asia was largely unchanging.
titles: Discovery of Quina technology challenges view of ancient human development in East Asia

title: Study shows groundwater gains in Arizona yet climate risks still threaten water supply
snippets: A combination of water management practices has contributed to notable groundwater gains in Central Arizona despite the region dealing with long-term water stress, according to a new study.
summary: A new study has found that a mix of water management strategies has led to significant increases in groundwater levels in Central Arizona, a region that has been facing long-term water stress.
titles: Study shows groundwater gains in Arizona yet climate risks still threaten water supply

title: My robot therapist: The ethics of AI mental health chatbots for kids
snippets: AI mental health apps may offer a cheap and accessible way to fill the gaps in the overstretched U.S. mental health care system, but ethics experts warn that we need to be thoughtful about how we use them, especially with children.
summary: AI mental health apps could provide an affordable option to address shortages in the U.S. mental health care system. However, ethics experts caution the importance of careful consideration in their usage, particularly with children.
titles: My robot therapist: The ethics of AI mental health chatbots for kids

title: Scientists pioneer method to tackle 'forever chemicals'
snippets: Researchers have developed an innovative solution to a pressing environmental challenge: removing and destroying per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS), commonly called 'forever chemicals.' A new study unveils a method that not only eliminates PFAS from water systems but also transforms waste into high-value graphene, offering a cost-effective and sustainable approach to environmental remediation.
summary: Researchers have created a method to remove 'forever chemicals' (PFAS) from water, converting the waste into valuable graphene. This sustainable solution addresses environmental concerns by eliminating PFAS and provides a cost-effective way to produce graphene.
titles: Scientists pioneer method to tackle 'forever chemicals'
